overview:
James Law is a founder and director of http://buildor.com, a London based software house specializing in advanced web design and editing tools for the browser.

James specializes in digital publishing and application interface development, with 15 years of design and management experience.

At the forefront of online publishing, he launched many multi-million pound products for News International including award winning work for The Sun Online, The Sunday Times and TheLondonPaper.
